alert.note: Alert for Madison (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 03 at 7:59AM CST until January 03 at 8:15AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 AM CST FOR NORTH CENTRAL MADISON PARISH... At 759 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Omega, or 8 miles northeast of Tallulah, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Madison Parish. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for northeastern Louisiana...and west central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
